Always gotta relate to MCs even if they are POS of a pushover beta cucks like Rito from To Love Ru or Kazuya from Rent a Girlfriend. Lastly, directing this to you and other vanilla cucks around here: Give it fucking time and eventually the cuck mentality will spread out around in the West. Already seeing it in like US' California or the UK/EU. It's not a matter of IF but WHEN. Real men are no longer born and raised.
